title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.8 - Tandem trailer combination special hauling permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.8 - Tandem trailer combination special hauling permit

State Regulations

Authorization issued by the Thruway Authority permitting
the operation on the Thruway system for an appropriate term of tandem trailer
combinations which exceed the limitations of section
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
